Try this: set the level to 111, then start playing. It worked for me.

I may not be able to create any levels for G:BF, as it's too big to go in my 
home computer... we'll see, though. With a few other players doing levels, I 
think we could turn this demo into an actual playable game. There aren't TOO 
many problems, and it's not THAT unstable...
   -Tevildo, Prince of Cats.
